title: Soft Skills & Aptitude Training
desc: We conduct regular training sessions covering communication skills, logical reasoning, group discussions, and personal interviews — all designed to help students navigate recruitment processes with confidence.

title: Industry-Oriented Technical Training
desc: Workshops, coding bootcamps, and domain-specific certification programs (AI/ML, Data Analytics, Cybersecurity, Core Engineering, etc.) are organized in collaboration with industry professionals to bridge the gap between academics and industry requirements.

title: Internship & Live Project Facilitation
desc: We actively connect students to internships and live projects across various domains, helping them gain hands-on experience, apply classroom knowledge, and build a strong professional portfolio.

title: MoUs & Industry Collaborations
desc: Through strategic partnerships and MoUs with leading companies, we facilitate exclusive training programs, placement opportunities, guest lectures, and curriculum inputs to align with current industry trends.

title: Alumni Interaction & Mentorship Programs
desc: Regular sessions with our alumni working at top-tier companies give students valuable insights into real-world challenges, interview experiences, career planning, and workplace expectations.

title: Pre-Placement & Company-Specific Training
desc: We offer targeted preparation for companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, and others. This includes mock aptitude tests, coding rounds, technical interviews, resume reviews, and HR-tech training.

title: Full-Length Mock Placement Drives
desc: We simulate the complete recruitment process — from aptitude tests and group discussions to technical and HR interviews — under real-time conditions to prepare students for the high-pressure environment of actual campus drives.

title: One-on-One Mock Interviews
desc: Personalized mock interviews with internal and external evaluators help students fine-tune their responses, improve articulation, and gain detailed feedback on technical and behavioral performance.

title: Industry Talks & Leadership Connects
desc: We regularly invite industry leaders, hiring managers, and startup founders for interactive sessions on hiring trends, future skill requirements, and innovation — giving students a pulse on what recruiters are really looking for.

title: Career Counselling & Progress Tracking
desc: Every student’s progress is tracked, and individual guidance is provided to help them choose the right career path — whether it’s campus placements, higher studies, or entrepreneurship.
